page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: In my free time I do all sorts of things. Sometimes I read or play with my friends, but at home I sometimes watch television. I may play with my sister Kendra. She is eight years old. We often play 'Downfall' although she occasionally cheats. I then go out to play with my friends and she feels wrong inside her. KERRY DUNN. I will never forget the day I went on a fun-run. This is a race which you do for enjoyments sake, not just to win. My sister and her friend went in fancy dress just for a joke. They chose to go as punks. A punk is a person who has hair done in weird colours - pink, green, blue, yellow and many more. Punks want to look different from anyone else. RACHEL STUART.
